head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PLETMAN, DR. MAX

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PLETMAN, DR. MAX

block.p: PLETMAN-Dr. Max. April 29, 2000, in New Haven, CT. Of 88 Notch Hill Rd., North Branford, CT. Husband of the late Rose Lissauer Pletman. Father of Sandra Lee and Susanne. Grandfather of Laurie Beth and Bruce David, and great-grandfather of Aaron Isaac. Funeral service Tuesday morning, 10 AM, at Temple Beth Tikvah, 196 Durham Rd., Madison, CT. Interment at Mt. Hope Cemetery, Hastings-on-Hudson, NY. Period of mourning will be observed at the Pletman residence, 88 Notch Hill Rd., North Banford, through Wednesday evening. Memorial contributions may be made to Temple Beth Tikvah. For information, Weller Funeral Home, New Haven.
